title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Science Foundation Ireland (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Science Foundation Ireland (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited science foundation ireland (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2024

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to 
any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on and after 
the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department 
of Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department higher education research innovation science (2) reference department enterprise trade employment contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department higher education research innovation science

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

by or under sections 11, 12 and 13 of the Industrial Development (Forfás 
Dissolution) Act 2014 (No. 13 of 2014) are transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, on and after the commencement of 
this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister enterprise trade employment section 11 12 13 industrial development (forfas dissolution) act 2014 (no 13 2014) transferred minister higher education research innovation science (2) reference minister enterprise trade employment contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science, the name of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in 
the proceedings for that of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall 
not abate by reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th April, 2024.

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment may, 
in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, be carried on 
or completed on or after such commencement by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister enterprise trade employment may far relates function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science carried completed commencement minister higher education research innovation science

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on 
and after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister 
for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister higher education research innovation science

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 7 reference minister enterprise trade employment contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and 
Employment in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, 
transfer or assignment, on such commencement — 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and 
Science, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science by this 
Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of 
the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment shall, on the request of the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 
be transferred into the name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
16 April, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
